website_summaries.verdict: A comprehensive set of edge and corner guards, carefully crafted to deliver the highest possible levels of safety and protection.
pros: Complete set takes care of two major baby proofing essentials
Soft, high density construction absorbs impact for superior protection
Free of harmful chemicals, heavy metals, and latex
Authentic 3M double sided tape provides reliable adhesion
Available in three neutral tones to suit any color scheme
cons: Single handed installation can be a bit tricky

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. It's saved our 8mo old little guy many a bonk on the head. Not having any difficulty with him picking the foam off, tho he is curious and does poke at it. He also tries to eat it, which we discourage by running a small electric current through the conductive foam. Just kidding. We sit him down and rationally explain why eating foam rubber that comes from some unspecified country of origin is maybe not the best long-term health plan. He's been remarkably responsive.
customer_reviews.author: pescador

customer_reviews.title: Great product saved my son a trip to the ER!
customer_reviews.text: These work great! Funny story, when I installed these to cover my fire place brink corners I did so only to stop the nagging of my wife. BUT not 10 minutes after finishing the install did my son come up to the fire place and trip falling head first into the foam covered brick corner... THANK GOD I finally listened to my wife! Instead of a trip to the emergency room he just bounced off of the foam and went about his business unharmed!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Y.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: I was worried the sticky wouldn’t hold but so far so good. My 10 month old pulls up on the fire place holding onto the guard, which is good since it’s soft/squishy and the fire place alone would scratch up his hands. I’m glad I don’t have to worry about him getting hurt on the edge and corners.
customer_reviews.author: bg001

customer_reviews.title: Not bite-proof
customer_reviews.text: My 12 month old could easily pull it off from day one so we tried more adhesive to have it stay in place. It’s been less than a month and my baby chew off pieces and choked on it. I ran to see him puking fragments of the bumper along with previously eaten meal. This should NOT be labeled as a baby proofing product!
customer_reviews.author: Blue Ford

customer_reviews.title: Try different tape backing.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality rubber. I went above and beyond prepping the fireplace. Cleaning It, adding adhesive, letting it stick before removing the other end etc. The roving cove actually worked like a handle grip for him to pull the whole thing off. 8 months old.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ebel

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds expectations!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best buy for this type of product that I've seen. The adhesive strips stick to the foam and to brick. There's plenty of it (adhesive and foam) and it doesn't look half bad either!
customer_reviews.author: eternalgreenknight

customer_reviews.title: Do not order this product. I would rate negative stars
customer_reviews.text: This product completely destroyed my new coffee table. Pictures attached. The adhesive stuck to my table and we had to order three different types of remover to get this off my table. This does not work for a toddler interested in pulling at things because once he began to grab the foam, it came right off, leaving the adhesives to be scraped off my wood furniture. I 100% do not recommend this product to anyone who cares about their furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Ruggles

customer_reviews.title: Looks very nice, provides good protection
customer_reviews.text: Used to protect toddler grandson from very sharp hearth and brick in front of fireplace. I had been using pipe insulation which did a good job protecting, but looked a bit tacky for the long haul. It is a bit tedious to place the tape strips on the long edging pieces but they seem to be holding well. The color blends well with our brick and it looks much like nice trim. The corners make the job look very finished. Time will tell about durability, but it has stood up to a busy 20+ pound guy pulling himself up and cruising along the hearth on several occasions. That's a good start. It definitely softens a dangerous hazard in our home.
customer_reviews.author: seattlesue

customer_reviews.title: These product ruined my walls
customer_reviews.text: This product ruined my walls. The idea of this product would be perfect but the seller does not reference how your child will tear these things off constantly. It’s good in retrospect but in reality these things are a hassle and once they get ripped off about two or three times they will not stick back on properly. So if you like the extra hassle of having to put these things back on constantly I suggest you buy these if you love the maintenance part about it the idea is great for safety but in reality it’s more of a hassle because you Your child will constantly rip these things off the wall 😹😿
customer_reviews.author: Campbackwoods

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous to Teethers! Ruins Furniture!
customer_reviews.text: Do Not Buy! Your babies definitely will not get girt hitting their head off this, great protection. But your teething baby will really love to bite this and eat it in large and small chunks, and I cannot imagine swallowing this can be good for their health. And don't say they won't chew on it because they will, I had a little get together with a group of crawling and walking aged children and at a point during the day every child was biting this. I am after ripping it all off, their is an insane amout of glue residue so if you have any decent furniture that you don't want damaged, this is not a good product
customer_reviews.author: Hazel Wesson

customer_reviews.title: Bumpers Look and Feel Great!
customer_reviews.text: PROS: - Easy to install as the stickers came attached - Look and feel durable and well made - Firm and dense, yet soft enough to provide a protective cushion CONS: - None really as we ordered more from this brand only (Roving Cove) after accidentally ordering a different brand that turned out to be a knockoff or cheaper version of this brand's bumpers. You won't be disappointed with these.
customer_reviews.author: justmeHK

customer_reviews.title: It’s very easy to install and doesn’t leave a sticky residue when ...
customer_reviews.text: This definitely saved my daughter a few times when she was learning to sit up and would lose her balance. It’s very easy to install and doesn’t leave a sticky residue when you take it off. We’ve had it for about 5 months now and I’ve only had one corner piece fall off (probably because it’s a high traffic area and got kicked a time or two). All of the other pieces have stayed right in place. It’s a great color too! It matches so well sometimes I forget it’s even there!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Not only for kid stuff! Used it on bed frame!
customer_reviews.text: I bought several all metal bed frames, and boy if you stubbed your knee or toe on it you would scream to the hills. In order to stop that from happening I purchased these foam corners and strips and now the frame legs are cushy. No more chance of smacking into it and seeing stars! It matched the color of the metal perfectly, too. It's all hidden under the bed skirt so you don't see a thing. It has nice adhesion with 3M tape and it was very easy to cut. Nice and thick and spongy. Perfect for this solution.
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Saving our legs.
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I got a bedroom set that at the time we didn’t realize that sharp corners in the footboard. After a few times cutting/scratching our legs on the footboard, we decided to buy this edging for the safety of ourselves and child. It stays in place and is perfect for blending in with darker wood colored furniture. We had tried buying a baby brand of plastic corner protectors and they just didn’t stay in place. This edging does!! So happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Extra cushiony, looks good, and sticks reasonably well
customer_reviews.text: Worked better than expected. We used it for a rough stone edge on our fireplace. We used a strip for the top edge and one directly below it for the bottom edge. The material is thick and cushiony. Stays on reasonably well. Tips: 1) Cut a little extra when measuring. We discovered that you can end up a little short depending on how much you stretch the material during measuring versus final application. 2) Does not reapply well. If you attempt to reposition it, it may not stick. Worked great for our purposes and looks polished (and doesn't scream "babyproofed"). Picture shows my baby exploring while we were half way through installing the edging.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great product! *Update
customer_reviews.text: Update* after having them for a few months. They’re peeling off when getting pulled on by now 11 Month old:/ i took them off and re applied the adhesive strips and there holding up better again. Original- Perfect! I was debating on multiple different brands and I’m glad I picked this one! Strong hold & think padding!! My 10 month old trys so hard sometimes to pull these off and they haven’t budged! & definitely saved her head from some accidents! She’s even tried to bite it before while I was putting it up and she didn’t get any pieces off or tear into it. Definitely going to be buying more!:)
customer_reviews.author: MommaEve

customer_reviews.title: Great for child proofing corners
customer_reviews.text: We have a step down living room and our kid is getting to the age of constantly moving around and falling. These furniture bumpers are perfect for protecting him from the corner of the step. They are easy to install and have had no issues with coming off. You simply cut the length needed and all the adhesives are included within the package to attach to any edges. The padding is thick enough to provide good protection and has a nice clean look.
customer_reviews.author: CharlieTop Contributor: Philosophy

customer_reviews.title: NEW PARENT - THIS PRODUCT TOTALLY WORKS AS ADVERTISED
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 1 year old, has already saved her some dental work. My kid goes down hard sometimes, I use this stuff on brick fireplace, wooden bench, and metal exercise bike. Well worth the money, some adhesion issues in a couple of the adhesion pads but they give you enough it’s not a problem. The kiddo cannot get these pads off without some serious work/time/effort. Peace of mind from sharp edges and I’ve bought two sets of this product.
customer_reviews.author: geek2785

customer_reviews.title: Works great to protect clumsy people from sharp edges
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to pad the corners of the seat on my camper dinette because my husband would scratch the back of his leg trying to squeeze into the bench seat. They served the purpose. It was eays to apply. The corners occasionally get ripped off from my husband sliding across them but that is to be expected. I just retape them when that happens . Overall has been very helpful in keeping him from scratching himself on the sharp corners. They are a foam like material and yes a teething child would be able to rip chunks out if it but that is just common sense. Don't let your kid chew on them.
customer_reviews.author: Krissy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent versatile foam edge. Keeps toddlers safe!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! I have used this most recently on my toddlers bed to protect his head after a couple incidents of burping his head on the edge. I also used these on our window ledges (the corner pieces), and learning towers edges (my son slipped once and hit his teeth so hard on the wood he was bleeding) so now we use this and trust 3m to keep it in place. Highly recommend Update 7/24/17. Still works great and srikk holding tight. Bought more to cover more window ledges in the house and rest of bed
customer_reviews.author: MCTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great for tough to cover edges
customer_reviews.text: My mom's house has a rock fireplace with a ledge that is right at my daughter's head height. This product did a wonderful job covering the edges - now she can roam free without us hovering over to make sure she doesn't smack her head. Was very easy to install and looks good (not too noticeable/distracting). Already looking to see where else in the house we can use this.
customer_reviews.author: Christine J

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Thankfully this hasn't come in handy yet as our little one hasn't fallen near our fireplace. But what it does is give us peace of mind when she is playing near it, we feel like it would still hurt hitting this but nowhere nearly as bad without it. It's a plus that it includes extra corners which we use for other tables. Installation was fairly easy and the adhesive is strong and sticks well even to glossy painted brick. Only suggestion to the manufacturer would be to have the adhesive already stuck to the cushion to make installation even easier. I would recommend this to any parent.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great for protection for babies, seniors, or disabled
customer_reviews.text: The foam protector totally exceeded my expectations. It's very thick!!! I have it all around my glass tv stand and every other place the baby (or anyone who's unsteady on their feet) is walking . Before you purchase know that the glue is very, very sticky which keeps it securely in place. It will leave a sticky residue that you will need to removed if you ever take the foam off, but you'll have the peace of mind knowing that your loved ones head, shins, ankle or whatever body part will not be bruised or injured with this covering the edges.
customer_reviews.author: luv my 2 and 4 leg babies

customer_reviews.title: I have been worrying a
customer_reviews.text: I have been worrying about our 11 month old grand daughter getting hurt on the edge of a marble coffee table we have. I don't want to do with out either of them so I decided on finding something that would provide protection for the most valuable of these two (the grand daughter). These were highly rated so I ordered a package. Perfect - it is a Perfect solution. I no longer fear injury to our precious grand daughter - and that is HUGE!
customer_reviews.author: Eugene B Fisher III

customer_reviews.title: Give them your money!
customer_reviews.text: This has some amazing adhesive!! My daughter often holds onto the bumper I put on the tv stand and leans back (pulling with her entire body weight). It’s not budging. Nice and thick squishy material that has saved her head from bumps and bruises. Lots of material included as well as plenty of adhesive! I give this A++++++
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Weatherwax

customer_reviews.title: This was perfect for our brick fireplace hearth
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for our brick fireplace hearth. We have a cast iron pot belly fireplace sitting on a brick hearth. This was easy to install and has adhered well even with my 9 month old picking at it occasionally. We have a little left over and plan to pad the edges of our entertainment with it. It blends in well with our red brick or espresso entertainment center and is not overly obvious or obnoxious in our décor.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Star

customer_reviews.title: A couple dollars more expensive but definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.text: There is a couple of companies that sells this type of products. I bought this one and the other one that is slightly cheaper. So far this one is definitely better quality and more durable. The cheaper brand once is dented the shape will never raise back. As for this one I am sure that it will last a lot longer and aestheticly prettier than the other ones.
customer_reviews.author: calidoscopio

customer_reviews.title: Impressively high quality
customer_reviews.text: The product quality is IMPRESSIVELY HIGH. I rarely review my purchases, but I had to review this one. 1-The cushion is thick and soft, which will help a lot to reduce impacts. 2-The sticker tape doesn't come in a roll (comes in unfolded/unrolled strips), which helps for easy and accurate positioning without making a mess. 3-The color looks very nice on most dark woods. 4-Remember my words: you will sense the high quality EVEN BEFORE you open the package, just by holding it in your hands you will know this one is superior quality. 5-The 4 reasons above made my purchase this item again, which will be a gift for some friends who just had a baby.
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: Bye bye paint on the walls-my big mistake
customer_reviews.text: The concept is great but the tape ripped off the behr eggshell semi gloss paint on the corners of our walls (which i didn't think would be concerned a weak finish) . Plus my 13 month olds new favorite game is pulling every strip off so the walls are destroyed. If buying this product for wall corners then i would avoid at all cost unless you don't mind painting all of your walls and don't have a little one who gets into everything. Probably going to cost a few hundred to repaint as i don't know the current paint colors. Lesson learned, wallet burned.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Rauch

customer_reviews.title: Great value, works really well!
customer_reviews.text: The BEST for all those corners in an RV! The brown matches the interior perfectly so we can barely notice. But it has saved many head bumps or knee scrapes. With the way out kids jump around I am really happy we bought this. The amount you get too is a great value!!! We have plenty more if we need it and it’s so lightweight we can just store it in the travel trailer.
customer_reviews.author: TBF2020

customer_reviews.title: Actually sticks to fireplace hearth stone!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical since nothing we has purchased before had stuck to anything we wanted to baby proof, but this product is awesome and sticks really nice to our uneven surfaced stone hearth for our fireplace. We got enough to do two hearths in this package and that was great too!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Tough to apply but worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Great product but it took a while to get it on my table. I was never good with arts and crafts though, so take this review with a grain of salt lol. I would recomend putting the adhesive on the table and then putting the edging on. I tried to do the opposite and it was a hassle. Also, this stuff stretches quite a bit, don’t stretch it to much because it will shrink up on you, but if you don’t pull it tight enough it will bunch up. By the end of applying I had gotten the hang of it, but there is a learning curve. Overall I’m VERY happy with the look and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Via

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for fireplace
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to protect our little one from the edge of our very jagged and hard fireplace hearth. She’s been using it as a play area because it’s just the right height for her to play. She’s just learning to walk and very unstable so we knew we needed something to protect her if she fell. I was skeptical they would stay on the stone but they have and they were the perfect solution. We even used the extra corner pieces for our coffee table and they’re perfect. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Soft yet protective
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can completely cover the edge of my coffee table. I've used a couple of the corner kinds, and they just stick out, even small ones, but I think having the foam go all the way around makes the corner ones less of a target for my son to accidentally hit and knock off. The foam is also very soft (unlike the few corner ones I've tried), so they're hard to knock off, yet very durable. It's a little annoying to have to apply the tape yourself, but it was painless. You do have to work at applying it straight though, but that's okay, works fine with a few curves here and there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon CustomerTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Worth its weight in gold
customer_reviews.text: I used this product when my 1 year old stated crawling and standing up to protect him from the edges of our tv stand. It took me roughly 15 minutes to install it from the time I opened the package to the time everything was cleaned up. Our TV stand is more than 70 inches long and I still have half of the product left should I need it again. A great buy when it some to baby proofing.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Wowk

customer_reviews.title: good product, sticks well to furniture
customer_reviews.text: good product, sticks well to furniture. Our very active baby bumped his head many times on the corners and edges without major damage :) . I took one star off because it did not take too much effort for the baby to rip the product off the furniture in few places. Little sturdier material would provide more protection for curious heads. Overall, satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: L. S.

customer_reviews.title: Good looking bumper and stays on too!!
customer_reviews.text: When I got this adhesive bumper to protect my little one, I was a little bit hesitant because my glass table is only about a half inch thick. I figured anything was better than nothing, so I ordered anyway. Yes, it is a pain to put the sticky adhesive on to the bumper- but it's worth it knowing that my child will be protected. It actually looks better than I thought (not cheap looking), and it is still on with no problems, which is the best part! I would definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Monique Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to install all we had to do was cut to fit and my little guy is protected from the glass edges of our TV stand. Since it's just double sided sticky a little mineral spirits will remove it easily. Not sure how it would work on wood but for glass and metal it has been a win for us!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: How nice they are and feel
customer_reviews.text: I am older and my skin is thin as tissue paper so when I hit something I bruised or it is torn right away. I put you products on area that I feel safe to walk close to them. Now I need white square for kitchen cabinets without the long piece. Will be in touch. Thank you so very much. I have grand children and great grandchildren who will be safer here as well
customer_reviews.author: Jane Hatley

customer_reviews.title: Easy on, easy off
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this package because the beach condo we rented this summer had some gnarly low glass tables. Knowing our boys will do essentially anything to injure themselves we bought this and installed it on all of the glass table edges. It went on great and came off with little effort when we packed up to leave. This gave us peace of mind we wouldn't be in the hospital on vacation. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Looks good on our industrial style coffee table - The black ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks good on our industrial style coffee table - The black mimics the original metal edging but I feel much better about my son pulling up on the table now. Since this doesn't wrap all the way around we have to be careful that he doesn't come underneath the table and his head on the bottom of the edge, which is still exposed. Took some time to cut and install, and where my son likes to pull up, the command strips have weakened so we will have to replace them soon (originally installed 2 weeks ago). They sent plenty of extra strips with the package, so we will be able to replace when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney G.

customer_reviews.title: Takes the Edge Off
customer_reviews.text: This product has lasted through 2 toddler periods. When I see a potential risk area, I go to the package and cut a new strip. In several minutes the risk is contained. Our latest toddler likes to chew everything, including these bumpers. He usually gets through most things, but not this. He's given up and looks around for other things, like his sister's sandals. Five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Lindy Funkhouser

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I did not use the corners but the straight piece worked perfectly for our pellet stove. The surface is rock and it’s perfect mouth level for our baby. I’m always scared she’s going to bash her face on the edge. I no longer worry. Very easy to install and actually doesn’t look bad.
customer_reviews.author: MDThomas86

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY 3 M ADHESIVE AND NICE CUSHION
customer_reviews.text: the corner pieces are great and have preinstalled adhesive.. the loger pieces are cut to fit and required you to put double sided strips where you need. the adhesive strips are included and you will have more than you need.. adhisive is 3m with graet sticking power and can be reset after sticking once or twice if you make a mistake when placing but i would try to movethem too many times long after install.. i will def be buying more
customer_reviews.author: jonel anderson

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was a tad spendy At first for some foam and adhesive but it’s very good quality and well worth the money. It looks nice, it sticks well, and it’s very soft and feels durable. I did some test bumps on the corner of my glass/metal table and it just felt like foam. You’d really have to whack yourself on it to get hurt. I thought a bumper on the table would look gaudy but this really looks just fine in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Holliman

customer_reviews.title: Banish baby bumps
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for quickly babyproofing coffee tables and other sharp edges. Just cut the foam to size, stick on the double-sided tape, and apply to clean surfaces. I wish the double-sided tape was already stuck onto the foam as they do with the foam corner pieces, but otherwise this product is a breeze, and blends in nicely with our existing furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Kervina

customer_reviews.title: Great For Keeping The Kids From Busting Something Open On Your DIY Project
customer_reviews.text: We built a tiered shared nightstand/headboard deal for my daughters to use, but I knew the joins could be a hazard if not covered. When I saw this I knew it would work and it did. It's stuck much better than I suspected it would (I thought I might have to add an adhesive and I was ok with that) and frames it out well for our intended purpose (we have added strips to the front edges to there will be no major injuries with it).
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Burns

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose
customer_reviews.text: Great product - serves its purpose and very versatile. One thing can be improved though - I wish they had the sticky tape already attached to the foam. Getting it on properly can be a little bit of a challenge (especially with a toddler trying to investigate what's going on), and if it's not attached to every inch of foam my one year old can take it off.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good! Happy customer...
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! This little funky shelf my husband and I pieced together for our son’s bookshelf has some sharp edges. This single shelf install took 20 minutes at most. I was pressed to do this before bedtime so I am sure it could be neater, but I am a tired mom, haha. Like others, I do wish the long coil had 3M tape on it (hard to line up the tape and refrain from overlapping pieces), but, like parenting, you do what you have to do! I am happy with the product thus far and will update if I install more elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly high quality for price
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how adhesive the tape was that came with this kit. It's actually really high quality for the price. A little tricky to install, but well worth it. This is a great universal baby proofing item for almost any edges in your house.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Works well on slanted edges
customer_reviews.text: Tables slopes on the edge so the see thru corner plastic ones were too small to work. Those were ripped out about 2-3 days after putting them on. This one has been solid so far for a month. This connects better and it's wider so it works with angled edges to connect with more surface area. Plus having the side strips are important too to prevent other accidental slips on the non-corners.
customer_reviews.author: P-man

customer_reviews.title: Baby proofing must have!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my large rectangular coffee table as soon as my baby started crawling. The padding is excellent and has protected my baby’s head during many falls against the coffee table edges and metal legs. It also given him better grip to pull himself up to a standing position so he can cruise along the furniture.
customer_reviews.author: stfam

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the edges of the cubbies in our day care facility. The material is top quality - firm yet spongy. The corners are especially well put together. There is no odor to the product. There is plenty of tape and I was happy to see it was not the cheap double sided white-foam tape. It seems to hold very strong but I’m curious how long it will last with our little kids. I highly recommend putting the tape on the surface first, not the foam.
customer_reviews.author: L. Camp547

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and thick. Will buy more
customer_reviews.text: I know this is really meant for indoors, but I needed something to cover our raised-bed garden to prevent splinters and sharp edges. We used gorilla double sided tape (meant for outdoors) instead of the tape that came with this so I can’t comment about the adhesion, but we’ve had several rain storms now and so far it’s held up. I don’t expect this to last more than 1/2 a yr but hopefully it lasts until winter. It’s Very easy to install, very thick and soft, foam consistency. It should definitely soften the blow if someone fell. Happy with the purchase and will be purchasing several more to cover the other raised bed gardens.
customer_reviews.author: Mr and Mrs Up

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't look bad and works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: A really great product! The second my baby could crawl she was headed towards our big brick fireplace. We opted for the brown guard, and while it is very apparent the guard is there, it doesn't look bad at all. I did see previous reviews mentioning that the guard did not adhere to brick, but I have a very traditional red brick fireplace and it hasn't budged for many months. My kid has also tested out the cushioning of the guard on several occasions, and we haven't had bumps, bruises, or tears of any kind.
customer_reviews.author: Makalohee

customer_reviews.title: Great added protection
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use/ install and has saved our LO's head many of times. Adhesive is really good on the corners, as well as the strips you use for the rest of it. Make sure you clean the surface before putting them on. So far we haven't had any part of them come up and they have definitely given us piece of mind as our LO is pulling herself up on everything and exploring all parts of the house.
customer_reviews.author: Kstone34

customer_reviews.title: Safety proof that looks nice!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look of the protective border on my fireplace. I wasn't sure at first when I received it because I wasn't sure if it would stick well. I place it on and held it in place for a few minutes. On the corners, I placed a book for a short period of time and it has been holding up well. My grandbaby has waddled by it and I feel a little more at ease in case he falls. I would recommend this product. Very easy to apply.
customer_reviews.author: KLark

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install accomplish the purpose
customer_reviews.text: I got this to protect rolling mirrors. I installed all around 8X6 mirrors attached to carts, the constant movement expose the mirror to bump to each other and produce cracks in corners this product prevent that and. The adhesive is easy to install and very strong and in the bag come several to cover a lot of feet also in the package come pre made L corners so you are all set
customer_reviews.author: H. Justo

customer_reviews.title: Nice and smooshy
customer_reviews.text: I'm using them to protect our old bodies from bruises and skin scraping in our RV. We just bought a new RV but it has some very sharp edges, especially in the bedroom which made bed making perilous. But now i can bounce around with no crying like a baby. I couldn't wait to 5 star this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Debby

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Effective
customer_reviews.text: My little one has managed to pull the long strips up from time to time, but that's just because he's a strong, determined little guy, and it took months for him to do so. The foam in this kit is top quality and the included sheets of adhesive are very effective.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C. Plowden

customer_reviews.title: Worked on a rough surface!!
customer_reviews.text: Daughter and family (including 11 month old) would be staying with us for a few weeks, used the cove around all our tables and the fireplace hearth, this was about 2" high and made from pavers with a sharp edge. The cove was still easy to put on and the tape is holding it in place. Very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: go4par

customer_reviews.title: Strong adhesive, high quality material. A great find.
customer_reviews.text: Initially, I thought it was going to be bigger, but I was wrong. However, I still give it 5 stars because it fitted perfect on the corners and edges. It is cushy enough that I can trust my babies won't hurt themselves if they hit the marble by accident. The adhesive is holds strong this definitely was a must, they delivered for sure. The length was perfect for our island and side wall. They added many stripes of adhesive tape that was also a big plus. The color blends in, is not invasive. Overall, I highly recommend it, excellent material quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ovi Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: It works if you didn’t have a baby. Every ...
customer_reviews.text: It works if you didn’t have a baby. Every time we turn around she is ripping it all off of the brick. It’s a low adhesive tape so no residue is left behind. But you wouldn’t want any left behind either so kind of a catch 22. I wouldn’t buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Twisted Ink Tattoo Studio

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: This stuff has seriously saved my clumsy 1 year olds life like 8 times since we installed it 5 days ago. Like some of the other reviews state, it's kind of labor intensive to put on, but I really think it's worth it. I had to pull up one of the pieces to realign it and it pulled off some of the finish of the table (it's probably paint, it's a really cheap table from a discount furniture store). Which is fine with me because I would rather it be firmly attached to the table than my son try to pull his heavy butt up on this, it pull away from the table, and him possibly get hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Searcy

customer_reviews.title: The roll of foam tubing does not come with an adhesive strip attached.
customer_reviews.text: The foam itself is nice and thick. I was shocked and disappointed when I received this product and realized the foam did not come with an adhesive strip attached. The adhesive strips come in a separate bag and you have to measure and apply it yourself. Also the adhesive strips are very thin. A tad thin for the bulky foam padding. I applied the foam around the edge of my night stand and granite counter in my kitchen. By the next day the foam was hanging down. Since then i have basically been pressing it back onto the strip of adhesive in an attempt to get it to stick. Doesn't really work. Only for a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Coolj21

customer_reviews.title: Beware The Tape
customer_reviews.text: The tape that came with this product is horrible. Not only is it difficult to apply it to the bumper but it has ruined multiple pieces of furniture. Stripping off paint and even pieces of wood upon removal of the bumper. do not use!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua C.

customer_reviews.title: Good product kind of annoying assembly
customer_reviews.text: we really like this product because of the softness and protection for our littles but it’s annoying that it doesn’t already come with the double sided tape on it and that comes in little strips so takes awhile to put it all together especially if you’re ocd like me! So really like it but would make more sense to come with tape already on it I think
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: Works but hard to install and expensive
customer_reviews.text: I bought a couple of packages of these. They protect the baby from the edges of the bed and bed tables. They are not easy to install - you have to install the adhesive tape on the padding and then apply it to the furniture edge. Even with the difficulty installing them, I’d give a higher rating if they weren’t so expensive. They are like pool parts in that regard (ridiculously expensive for a cheap piece of plastic). When you’re ready to take them off, set aside several hours and hope your furniture finish (paint, veneer, etc.) is the highest quality known to man. That said, these will save you a trip to the emergency room!
customer_reviews.author: Jim S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for fireplace
customer_reviews.text: My daughter recently tripped and cut her face on our brick fireplace. She had to get stitches. While in the E.R. waiting to get stitched up, we ordered this and paid for advanced shipping. Got this the next day and put it on our fireplace. It works great!!! So far it's been on for a week and has not fallen off. Stays put. Very happy with this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: ❤️

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to do it your self. We had a coffee table with very sharp corners. With young children we knew we needed to add some type of safety for it. This was so easy and it doesn’t look cheap or cheesy. It actually looks like it came with the table. Love it and my kids love it even more.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works great!
customer_reviews.text: Using this to pad the corners and edges of a large slate fireplace. It was easy to install, easy to cut, and it sticks really well to the stone! It looks like it will last a long time and protect our baby from many head bumps.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Easy and super soft.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, super sticky tape, and cushy! I used this to protect the edges of a stairway that intrudes a little in my garage. Knowing we will hit our heads on this, I looked for something that would protect our noggins. Thus worked perfectly and is super soft. My son has already "used" it and said it was wonderful stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Oahu Dad

customer_reviews.title: SAFE FOR CHILDREN :)
customer_reviews.text: We purchased after our son hurt himself on the corner of our fireplace. It was really easy to put on and I have enough to cover another area! The adhesive strips included are great and my children haven’t been able to pull or tear them off. I found that heating the edges of a knife and than immediately cutting the edge protector to size made it an easier process. Be very careful if you choose to do this.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Thick, safe foam to protect your kids!
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality, very thick foam that I adhered to the edge of our fireplace hearth to protect my son from hurting himself. I like that it is made of safe materials. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because it requires you to adhere the double sided tape yourself and it is a tedious, slightly tricky task to do by yourself. Otherwise, would definitely recommend. The color was a nice neutral that blended well with my white and grey/beige fireplace and didn’t draw a lot of unwanted attention.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Dense padding and not bulky looking.
customer_reviews.text: I actually used this on the ceiling going to my basement. It’s a low head clearance and wanted something that would protect me from bumping or scraping my head going down the steps if I wasn’t paying attention..lol It fit perfectly on the edge. Nice amount of padding without being too bulky. I wanted a permanent solution so I opted to use a zero second hold construction adhesive vs the 3M tabe adhesive that was supplied.
customer_reviews.author: kristina

customer_reviews.title: Love this edging for my office desk!
customer_reviews.text: I actually used this product on my work desk. Working at a desk 8 hours a day, I would get imprints of the desk edges on my forearms. I found an office product for a desk on a random website but it was extremely expensive. This was a great alternative, cheap, and easy to use. It also helps to keep my wrists elevated a bit for a good ergonomic fit.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Moser

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: watch video showed how to install very easy and fast works like a charm keeps our 10mth old granddaughter from hitting her head on the table edge when she is pulling herself up and trying to walk along the table. We are very happy with the product and recommend it to anyone who has a young child.
customer_reviews.author: maureen koscielak

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome and exactly what I was looking for. The material is thick and honestly protects from sharp corners. I have 9 month old twin baby girls who are all over the place! This product has saved their heads so many times! I used it around all the edges of my brick fireplace, as well as my entertainment center. Very easy to apply. It comes in a big roll, like a hose, where you just measure how long you need and then cut with regular scissors. You measure, cut and apply double sided adhesive tape and push and hold into place. Super easy, super quick, super thankful for this product!
customer_reviews.author: Jojo.Reyna

customer_reviews.title: Not just for toddlers anymore
customer_reviews.text: I do not have small children in my house anymore, I have found myself in a wheelchair and making all kinds of problems running into things. I bought this to cover up my scrapes. It works wonderfully and is a great 'buffer' should my w.chair decide to attempt to scrape on my dresser again I now have protection
customer_reviews.author: MissinLondonLots

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for baby proofing that sharp corner.
customer_reviews.text: Get it!! The adhesive is easy to apply and it just takes a couple of measurements to get the perfect fit. My 10 month old has been attempting to yank it about to no avail since I put it on (a solid two weeks maybe more?) and it hasn’t given! 😏
customer_reviews.author: Shurrie

customer_reviews.title: Buy it! It is worth it 10x over.
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! After over 6 months of use these are still going strong. My 1 and 4 year old pull and twist and sit and slide all over and the adhesive is still stuck on there with no budging. I used it around my coffee tables so things have gotten spilled numerous times and it hasn’t affected it at all. My kids have even pulled and tried to pull it off (I stopped them soon after they started so they probably could have gotten it off if left to it long enough) but there is no spot that has stopped sticking or is loose or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: We are buying again
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality of cusion and appearance. Doesn’t stick well to uneven surfaces. We have a batural wood table and our toddler them the cusions off on the first day. He hasn’t been able to unglue the ones glued to stone surfaces and smooth furniture. Ordered anothet set today.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't expecting it to work this well!
customer_reviews.text: I have a stone hearth and really wasn't expecting it to stick as well as it does but I'm pretty pleasantly surprised with how well it works. It was a tad bit annoying to install, but I doubt theres a better way for them to "pre-stick" the 3M stickers without them getting all bent out of shape. It does come rolled up but if you read the directions it'll say to stretch it out overnight/for 24 hours? I did it and it held it's "straight" shape pretty well. It's probably worth noting that the edges of my hearth are pretty much 90 degrees but they're not smooth, the stone is "textured".
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Easy and quick
customer_reviews.text: I’m a fan. Easy to install, cushy, and toxic-free. I put it all around the sharp edges of my coffee table and even the sharp legs on my couch. Perfect timing as my baby is starting to crawl and pull up on things
customer_reviews.author: Angelica M.

customer_reviews.title: These are okay but they come off eventually
customer_reviews.text: So these are great if they’re already cut for corners but ....if not and you’re trying to actually cut it to use on a corner piece it’s a bit harder. It’s got great padding, saved my child a bunch of times from cracking himself wide-open the only thing I’m gonna say is you have to be careful cutting these pieces especially for corners because if you don’t get it to fit it’ll hold on for a week or two and then it starts to come off and then it’s a pain in the butt to try and put back every single time
customer_reviews.author: jeannette

customer_reviews.title: HAS ALREADY PAID FOR ITSELF by saving my baby's face ...
customer_reviews.text: HAS ALREADY PAID FOR ITSELF by saving my baby's face! We have wood floors and my baby slipped in his pajamas and hit his face on the corner of the chimney but thanks to this bumper he didn't even have a scratch. Now my babies can play near the chimney without me worrying.
customer_reviews.author: Nea Cane

customer_reviews.title: The color got dirty easily and the glue is dried up after 1 month
customer_reviews.text: This corner baby proofing is good to cover the sharp edge of the area in front of our fireplace. I was so happy to get it for my baby when he turned 8 months old. He started to crawl everywhere and tended to bump his head to the sharp corner of the fireplace areas. I wish I bought a darker color because this one got dirty easily. After one month of use, my baby just took it out easily because all of the glue dried out. I had to buy a double sided tape to glue it back on, but it is not working again. The 8 pieces for the corner lasted longer. It lasted almost 2 years now.
customer_reviews.author: Dunxalon

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace the ones I had originally purchased at Buy Buy Baby that my son was tearing off of our fireplace. They were cheaper than Buy Buy Baby and surprisingly much better quality. I liked that they were already curved and that they had corner pieces to go with them. Granted, I still have to watch my nine month old son who is still able to pull them off with effort, but they are the absolute best I feel like I can expect for fireplace bumpers - and they have already prevented a few head injuries from tumbles. ;)
customer_reviews.author: jelledge

customer_reviews.title: Great safe option-prevents potential injuries!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to install- I used it on all edges of a platform bed that normally was a toe and shin buster, to make it safe for my disabled stepdaughter. Pleased to say it did prevent any potential injuries, I used it with faux foam brick sheets adhered to the headboard. Only thing I would do different is measure the strips instead of eyeballing it!
customer_reviews.author: Parsonsdeb

customer_reviews.title: Will save your little ones from a bump on the head.
customer_reviews.text: I have a granite countertop in my kitchen. I have been worried because my son is exactly the right height to get hit his head on the countertop. This was the perfect solution. It was easy to install and it adheres really well. It’s been a few months and it’s all still where I put it. It also looks way better than I thought. It’s not that noticeable, it matches the countertop so well. I also like that I was able to apply it all the way around my countertop as well as the corners.
customer_reviews.author: Rosy

customer_reviews.title: Super strong tape
customer_reviews.text: Pros- The double-sided tape was SUPER strong! Sticking on great to our brick fireplace as well as our coffee table that has uneven beveled corners. It really is super dense foam. Cons- A little skinnier than I was imagining but it does the trick just fine. The corners were pre-taped, the 15 ft edge was not. It does come with the tape but is a a little bit of a pain to put on straight. My boy also really liked the additional chew toy...
customer_reviews.author: bethanne

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic! It’s the third padding I’ve tried for our fireplace and it’s the only one that has worked. It’s easy to install and works well! I would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Clair

customer_reviews.title: Saved my daughter from a bad accident.
customer_reviews.text: I am one of those who does not write a review for every product but feel I should because this saved my 14 month daughter from a terrible accident. Being 14 months she is starting to walk but still very wobbly. She was furniture walking and tripped on our shag rug and hit her head on the padded table. She probably fell with about 60% of her weight hitting her forehead area. She cried for about 10 seconds and it left a red mark but saved a trip to the ER. I can’t image what could have happened if I didn’t install the pad around the edge of our glass table.
customer_reviews.author: J. H.

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Works as expected and very soft
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and durability. I usted on a cofee tablet and they stick perfect. Very soft material. My son hit with a corner that I covered with this product and he did not harm. Thank you. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I used it to stop robot vacuum from getting stuck! Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I did not use this product to baby proof- I used it to stop my robot vacuum from getting stuck under my kitchen cabinets. It is perfect! It isn’t obvious, you don’t notice it if it’s not pointed out. I’m super happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Hoerner

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: I attached this to a brick fireplace about a week ago. So far, it's holding up nicely. My 2 year old has crawled on it multiple times without it pulling off. He even picked at it trying to move it but it stayed in place. While I put it on by myself, I would recommend installing it with two people. It would be easier to have someone hold/guide the unstuck section while the other person does the sticking.
customer_reviews.author: lilart14

customer_reviews.title: Padding is comfortable & stays put
customer_reviews.text: As we now have a roaming baby, we installed the edge and corner guards to pad our furniture. It's super easy to install - just measure the length you need and place the double-sided tape onto the foam pieces. The padding is not hard, but also not too soft. Our baby pulls herself up using the padded edges of the table and she's had no issues. The padding stays firm. Plenty of 3M double-sided tape comes with the kit, as well.
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: Not just for babies....
customer_reviews.text: I actually got this for a kitten who likes to gnaw on things. It has stopped the chewing on items I’ve used it on. It is soft so I am sure it would be good for babies as well. It is easy to install and so far the adhesive seems to be holding well. The real test will be how good is it when I pull it off. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last half as long as others
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd type of this product I have purchased (various sellers) and they have all lasted months. The tape for this product lasted a few weeks and fell off. To make it harder, instead of having a roll of double sided tape, this comes with several sheets of tape at a pre-cut length. Complete waste of my time to install it and remove it.
customer_reviews.author: NepaliChic

customer_reviews.title: Not useful for baby 8 months+
customer_reviews.text: I had found this product helpful when I first began to use this when my baby was 8 months. Unfortunately it only took a matter of weeks before she discovered that she could pull these off. By the time that my daughter reached the age of 10 months, these corner protectors were being used as a toy than anything else. I’m hoping that as she gets older she can understand not to pull these off. Until then, I am looking for an alternative that will withstand the strength of a 10 month old.
customer_reviews.author: J Singh

product_meta.title: Roving Cove Baby Proofing Edge Corner Protector, Soft Rubber Foam Table Bumper Guard, 3M Pre-Taped Corners, 20.4 ft (18 ft Edge + 8 Corners), Coffee Brown, Heavy-Duty
feature_bullets: HEAVY-DUTY PREMIUM RUBBER FOAM: Shore A 20-N density / 0.4-inch thick - maximum impact absorbent.

CLEAN SAFETY: Roving Cove uses safe and pure raw material and was the first brand to make foam safety bumpers without the use of toxic flame-retardant chemicals (SCCPs). Our edge corner guards contain no BPA, no phthalates, no heavy metals, no latex, no SCCPs. Inherently flame-resistant; passed flammability tests under US regulations.

DENSEST: Density is more important than thickness when it comes to softening impact. Our edge and corner guard measure Shore A 20-N density, much more dense than the industry standard of 13. Soft, high-density premium cushions absorb impact and protect your loved one from the sharp corners and edges in your home (nursery, kitchen, fireplace, coffee table), school, daycare, preschool, hospital, assisted living facility, senior housing, nursing home, factory, office, museum, restaurant and more.

JUMBO PACK: Covers 20.4 feet (245 inches) of surface area: 18 feet (5.5 meters) edge guards + 8 corner guards. Fits all standard size tables (round table up to 69" diameter, square table up to 56" square and rectangle table up to 36" x 78"). L-Shaped safety bumpers. Industrial strength.

SECURE ADHESION: Includes authentic easy-to-peel 3M double-sided tape (36 feet of tape for the edge guard), with 8 corner guards pre-taped. Coffee Brown color matches with oak, walnut, mahogany, cherry, or dark brown-colored wood, brick, stone, glass; such as coffee tables, chairs, chests, shelves, stairs and fireplaces/hearths. All text and photos/images in this product listing are copyrighted materials. Copyright: 2012-2020 Mayapple Baby LLC, Brooklyn NY, USA. Designed in USA.
